title: Mastering Reaction Conditions: Deepening Understanding of Chemical Reaction Conditions Through Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of balancing chemical equations, molar concepts, and basic reaction kinetics
context.additional_context: Environment where in-service secondary teachers reinterpret chemical reaction conditions in practical contexts, maintaining learning motivation through peer assessment and gamification elements

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify the limiting reagent under various chemical reaction conditions
Learners can quantitatively predict changes in product yield based on variations in reactant ratios
Learners improve collaborative problem-solving skills with peers through gamification activities (leaderboards, missions)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
